title: Zed Fan Art
body:
Here is my first bobble-head type of art I did:

http://m.imgur.com/nFaJFYa

Still thinking of a name for this type of art. Please request some champions for me to draw.
Any questions or improvements please comment.

replies.body: dude, i fucken love this type of shit. keep up bro{{item:3035}} {{champion:238}}
**'chibi' art,** also uhh use shading because just to me it looks like you did that in like 10 minutes :P

> **'chibi' art,** also uhh use shading because just to me it looks like you did that in like 10 minutes :P

Yeah... I was thinking people would post that I drew a Braum one with out shading but from now on i will try not to rush. Thanks for telling me :P
Thats cute, however Zed isn't meant to be cute, cool art tho :)
